languages.text: {n}Голос человека в маске неприятно скрипит:{/n} "Многие годы почтенный Леттард служил этому флагману и этой династии. Он врачевал и познавал, как велело ему его ремесло. Он спас многих, но не был спасен. За ним нет вины перед леди Кибеллой, он не оскорбил ее, лишь ответил на ее вопросы о его работе, после чего был атакован. Потому он имеет право требовать отмщения. Он ожидал бы, что смерть его убийцы будет соразмерным и законным воздаянием".

traits.locale_text: {n}Голос человека в маске неприятно скрипит:{/n} "Многие годы я служил этому флагману и этой династии. Я врачевал и познавал, как велит мне мое ремесло. Я спас многих, но не был спасен. За мной нет вины перед леди Кибеллой, я не оскорбил ее, лишь ответил на ее вопросы о моей работе, после чего был атакован. Потому я имею право требовать отмщения. Я ожидаю, что смерть моей убийцы будет соразмерным и законным воздаянием".

languages.text: {n}The masked man's voice is unpleasantly creaky.{/n} "The esteemed Lettard served this voidship and this dynasty for many years. He treated the sick and gained new knowledge as his trade commanded. He saved many, but he himself was not saved. He caused Mistress Kibellah no grievance. He never offended her. He merely answered her questions regarding his work, whereupon he was attacked. And so he has the right to demand a reckoning. The death of his murderer would be lawful and proportionate retribution."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос человека в маске неприятно скрипит:{/n} "Многие годы почтенный Леттард служил этому флагману и этой династии. Он врачевал и познавал, как велело ему его ремесло. Он спас многих, но не был спасен. За ним нет вины перед леди Кибеллой, он не оскорбил ее, лишь ответил на ее вопросы о его работе, после чего был атакован. Потому он имеет право требовать отмщения. Он ожидал бы, что смерть его убийцы будет соразмерным и законным воздаянием".

traits.locale_text: {n}The masked man's voice is unpleasantly creaky.{/n} "The esteemed Lettard served this voidship and this dynasty for many years. He treated the sick and gained new knowledge as his trade commanded. He saved many, but he himself was not saved. He caused Mistress Kibellah no grievance. He never offended her. He merely answered her questions regarding his work, whereupon he was attacked. And so he has the right to demand a reckoning. The death of his murderer would be lawful and proportionate retribution."

{n}The masked man straightens the unseen collar of his Chirurgeon's gown. His voice is unpleasantly creaky.{/n} "I have served this flagship and this dynasty for many years. I have treated the sick and gained new knowledge as my trade commands me to. I have saved many, but I was not saved myself. I caused no grievance to Lady Kibellah. I never offended her. I merely answered her questions regarding my work, whereupon I was attacked. Therefore I have the right to demand a reckoning. I expect the death of my murderer to be lawful and proportionate retribution."

{n}The masked man straightens the collar of his phantom chirurgeon's gown. His voice is unpleasantly creaky.{/n} "I have served this voidship and this dynasty for many years. I have treated the sick and gained new knowledge as my trade commands. I have saved many, but I myself was not saved. I caused Mistress Kibellah no grievance. I never offended her. I merely answered her questions regarding my work, whereupon I was attacked. And so I have the right to demand a reckoning. The death of my murderer would be lawful and proportionate retribution."

And so he has the right to demand a reckoning. The death of his murderer would be lawful and proportionate retribution."

languages.text: {n}La voix grinçante de l'homme masqué vous vrille les tympans.{/n} « L'honorable Lettard a servi ce vaisseau et cette dynastie pendant des années. Il a soigné les malades et acquis des connaissances avec l'expérience, comme l'exigeait sa profession. Il a sauvé bon nombre de vies, mais lui-même n'a pas pu être sauvé. Il n'a rien fait à maîtresse Kibellah. Il ne l'a jamais offensée. Il n'a fait que répondre à ses questions concernant son travail, et cela lui a valu d'être sauvagement attaqué. Il a donc le droit d'exiger rétribution. La mort de son assassin serait un châtiment légitime et approprié. »
languages.original_text: {n}The masked man's voice is unpleasantly creaky.{/n} "The esteemed Lettard served this voidship and this dynasty for many years. He treated the sick and gained new knowledge as his trade commanded. He saved many, but he himself was not saved. He caused Mistress Kibellah no grievance. He never offended her. He merely answered her questions regarding his work, whereupon he was attacked. And so he has the right to demand a reckoning. The death of his murderer would be lawful and proportionate retribution."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix grinçante de l'homme masqué vous vrille les tympans.{/n} « L'honorable Lettard a servi ce vaisseau et cette dynastie pendant des années. Il a soigné les malades et acquis des connaissances avec l'expérience, comme l'exigeait sa profession. Il a sauvé bon nombre de vies, mais lui-même n'a pas pu être sauvé. Il n'a rien fait à maîtresse Kibellah. Il ne l'a jamais offensée. Il n'a fait que répondre à ses questions concernant son travail, et cela lui a valu d'être sauvagement attaqué. Il a donc le droit d'exiger rétribution. La mort de son assassin serait un châtiment légitime et approprié. »

languages.text: {n}La voz del hombre enmascarado chirria tanto que resulta desagradable.{/n} «El venerable Lettard sirvió durante años a esta nave del vacío y a esta dinastía. Trató a los enfermos y aprendió, tal como dicta su profesión. Salvó a muchos, pero no fue salvado. No cometió agravio alguno contra la maestra Kibellah. No la ofendió. Solo contestó a sus preguntas sobre su trabajo, y luego le atacó. Por eso exige que se haga justicia. La muerte de su asesina sería una compensación legítima y proporcional».
languages.original_text: {n}The masked man's voice is unpleasantly creaky.{/n} "The esteemed Lettard served this voidship and this dynasty for many years. He treated the sick and gained new knowledge as his trade commanded. He saved many, but he himself was not saved. He caused Mistress Kibellah no grievance. He never offended her. He merely answered her questions regarding his work, whereupon he was attacked. And so he has the right to demand a reckoning. The death of his murderer would be lawful and proportionate retribution."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del hombre enmascarado chirria tanto que resulta desagradable.{/n} «El venerable Lettard sirvió durante años a esta nave del vacío y a esta dinastía. Trató a los enfermos y aprendió, tal como dicta su profesión. Salvó a muchos, pero no fue salvado. No cometió agravio alguno contra la maestra Kibellah. No la ofendió. Solo contestó a sus preguntas sobre su trabajo, y luego le atacó. Por eso exige que se haga justicia. La muerte de su asesina sería una compensación legítima y proporcional».

languages.text: {n}仮面の男の声は耳障りな軋みを上げる。{/n}「名誉あるレタードは長年、このヴォイドシップと王朝に仕えてきました。病人を治療して、仕事で得た新たな知識を蓄えてきました。多くの人間を救ってきたというのに、彼の命は救われなかった。キベラ様に恨まれる言われはありません。彼女を怒らせたこともありません。彼はただ、仕事について質問されたので答えただけだというのに、その後すぐに襲われたのです。だから、彼には罰を求める権利があります。彼を殺した犯人には死こそが、法律の上でも相応しい罰でしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The masked man's voice is unpleasantly creaky.{/n} "The esteemed Lettard served this voidship and this dynasty for many years. He treated the sick and gained new knowledge as his trade commanded. He saved many, but he himself was not saved. He caused Mistress Kibellah no grievance. He never offended her. He merely answered her questions regarding his work, whereupon he was attacked. And so he has the right to demand a reckoning. The death of his murderer would be lawful and proportionate retribution."

traits.locale_text: {n}仮面の男の声は耳障りな軋みを上げる。{/n}「名誉あるレタードは長年、このヴォイドシップと王朝に仕えてきました。病人を治療して、仕事で得た新たな知識を蓄えてきました。多くの人間を救ってきたというのに、彼の命は救われなかった。キベラ様に恨まれる言われはありません。彼女を怒らせたこともありません。彼はただ、仕事について質問されたので答えただけだというのに、その後すぐに襲われたのです。だから、彼には罰を求める権利があります。彼を殺した犯人には死こそが、法律の上でも相応しい罰でしょう」

languages.text: {n}蒙面人的声音沙哑得令人生厌。{/n}“这么多年来，尊敬的莱塔德一直都在勤勤恳恳地服侍这艘虚空舰，服侍着王朝。他治疗病人，获得新的知识，这是他的职责所在。他救下了许多人，可他自己却未能得救。他并没有冒犯过绮贝菈女士，她问了他几个工作方面的问题，他仅仅是诚实地回答了她的问题，就遭到了她的袭击。因此，他有权要求凶手偿命。这样的惩罚既合情，又合理。”
languages.original_text: {n}The masked man's voice is unpleasantly creaky.{/n} "The esteemed Lettard served this voidship and this dynasty for many years. He treated the sick and gained new knowledge as his trade commanded. He saved many, but he himself was not saved. He caused Mistress Kibellah no grievance. He never offended her. He merely answered her questions regarding his work, whereupon he was attacked. And so he has the right to demand a reckoning. The death of his murderer would be lawful and proportionate retribution."

traits.locale_text: {n}蒙面人的声音沙哑得令人生厌。{/n}“这么多年来，尊敬的莱塔德一直都在勤勤恳恳地服侍这艘虚空舰，服侍着王朝。他治疗病人，获得新的知识，这是他的职责所在。他救下了许多人，可他自己却未能得救。他并没有冒犯过绮贝菈女士，她问了他几个工作方面的问题，他仅仅是诚实地回答了她的问题，就遭到了她的袭击。因此，他有权要求凶手偿命。这样的惩罚既合情，又合理。”

languages.text: {n}Der maskierte Mann hat eine unangenehm knarrende Stimme.{/n} "Der geschätzte Lettard hat diesem Raumschiff und dieser Dynastie viele Jahre lang gedient. Er hat die Kranken gepflegt und neues Wissen erlangt, wie es von ihm erwartet wurde. Er hat viele gerettet, aber er selbst wurde nicht gerettet. Er hat Meisterin Kibellah nie Kummer bereitet. Er hat sie nie verärgert. Er hat lediglich ihre Frage zu seiner Arbeit beantwortet, woraufhin er angegriffen wurde. Also hat er das Recht, Vergeltung zu fordern. Der Tod seines Mörders wäre eine gesetzmäßige und angemessene Strafe."
languages.original_text: {n}The masked man's voice is unpleasantly creaky.{/n} "The esteemed Lettard served this voidship and this dynasty for many years. He treated the sick and gained new knowledge as his trade commanded. He saved many, but he himself was not saved. He caused Mistress Kibellah no grievance. He never offended her. He merely answered her questions regarding his work, whereupon he was attacked. And so he has the right to demand a reckoning. The death of his murderer would be lawful and proportionate retribution."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der maskierte Mann hat eine unangenehm knarrende Stimme.{/n} "Der geschätzte Lettard hat diesem Raumschiff und dieser Dynastie viele Jahre lang gedient. Er hat die Kranken gepflegt und neues Wissen erlangt, wie es von ihm erwartet wurde. Er hat viele gerettet, aber er selbst wurde nicht gerettet. Er hat Meisterin Kibellah nie Kummer bereitet. Er hat sie nie verärgert. Er hat lediglich ihre Frage zu seiner Arbeit beantwortet, woraufhin er angegriffen wurde. Also hat er das Recht, Vergeltung zu fordern. Der Tod seines Mörders wäre eine gesetzmäßige und angemessene Strafe."

languages.text: {n}Maskeli adamın sesi, nahoş bir şekilde gıcırtılı çıkıyor.{/n} "Muhterem Lettard, uzun yıllar boyunca bu uçsuz gemisine ve hanedanlığa hizmet etti. Mesleğinin gerektirdiği üzere hastaları tedavi edip yeni bilgiler edindi. Nicelerini kurtarsa da kendisini kurtaramadı. Kibellah Hanım'a hiçbir sıkıntı çıkarmadı. Onu asla rencide etmedi. Yalnızca işine dair sorduğu soruları cevapladı. Bunun üzerine saldırıya uğradı. Bu nedenle hesaplaşma talep etme hakkına sahip. Katilinin ölümü, hem yasal hem de uygun bir cezalandırma olacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}The masked man's voice is unpleasantly creaky.{/n} "The esteemed Lettard served this voidship and this dynasty for many years. He treated the sick and gained new knowledge as his trade commanded. He saved many, but he himself was not saved. He caused Mistress Kibellah no grievance. He never offended her. He merely answered her questions regarding his work, whereupon he was attacked. And so he has the right to demand a reckoning. The death of his murderer would be lawful and proportionate retribution."
